## Data Processing

```{r}
#| echo: false
# Calling libraries
library(tidyverse)
library(tidycensus)
library(httr)
library(jsonlite)
```


```{r}
## Utilizing Get Function to get information from API
URL <- "https://api.census.gov/data/2004/acs/acs1/pums"
id_info <- httr::GET(URL)
str(id_info, max.level = 1)

```

```{r}
## Creating a tibble to view API information
parsed<-fromJSON(rawToChar(id_info$content))
info2<-as_tibble(parsed$dataset)
info2
```
